srm_base_handle

Client options for configurating the access.

Summary
srm_base_handle
Client options for configurating the access.
Class Hierarchy

srm_base_handle
Class Declaration
class srm_base_handle extends uvm_object
priorityPriority of the sub sequence.
search_adapterPointer to the adapter instance search logic.
addr_map_nameName of the address map.
enable_functional_coverageEnables functional coverage for all the access to the design.
skip_read_error_msgDebug variable to switch off error messages from failing reads.
error_msgsList of error messages encountered so far.
Initialization
newCreate a new instance.
initializeInitialize the instance of base handle.
append_errorAppend error msgs for debug later by the client.

priority

int seq_priority

Priority of the sub sequence.

search_adapter

srm_search_adapter search_adapter

Pointer to the adapter instance search logic.

addr_map_name

string addr_map_name

Name of the address map.

enable_functional_coverage

bit enable_functional_coverage

Enables functional coverage for all the access to the design.

skip_read_error_msg

bit skip_read_error_msg

Debug variable to switch off error messages from failing reads.

error_msgs

string error_msgs[$]

List of error messages encountered so far.

new

function new( string  name  =  "" )

Create a new instance.

Use UVM Factory instead to create the instance.

virtual function void initialize( srm_search_adapter  search_adapter,
string  addr_map_name )

Initialize the instance of base handle.

Factory uses the default constructor.

function void append_error( string  msg )

Append error msgs for debug later by the client.

class srm_base_handle extends uvm_object
Client options for configurating the access.
int seq_priority
Priority of the sub sequence.
srm_search_adapter search_adapter
Pointer to the adapter instance search logic.
string addr_map_name
Name of the address map.
bit enable_functional_coverage
Enables functional coverage for all the access to the design.
bit skip_read_error_msg
Debug variable to switch off error messages from failing reads.
string error_msgs[$]
List of error messages encountered so far.
function new( string  name  =  "" )
Create a new instance.
virtual function void initialize( srm_search_adapter  search_adapter,
string  addr_map_name )
Initialize the instance of base handle.
function void append_error( string  msg )
Append error msgs for debug later by the client.
